title: 40: MJ Gets Real Ratchet, Grandma Pole Dancing & Bleaching Buttholes
itunes:title: MJ Gets Real Ratchet, Grandma Pole Dancing & Bleaching Buttholes
description:
Bunnie discovered the beautiful and sexy MJ, or Madysun Jaques, on TikTok, and boy is she glad to have found her. MJ mixes her comedy with her hot body, sexy videos, and isn’t afraid to be a little ratchet as well.

MJ talks about how she got her start on TikTok, why you definitely want to sign up for her OnlyFans, her new adult entertainment career that’s about to skyrocket, and how her grandma is her biggest supporter.

She and Bunnie also share secrets on butthole management, vaginoplasties, and what celebrities MJ has had some offline fun with. 

 

Takeaways:

  • MJ lives in Myrtle Beach, but the slowish pace of the town didn’t stop her from becoming huge on social media. Her TikTok has over 300k followers with 4.1 million likes. 
  • MJ runs everything she does as a real business, including her OnlyFans account. She also recently signed with a management group for real adult entertainment videos, so expect her to blow up in that area as well. 
  • Bunnie’s advice to MJ is make sure you do everything you want to, but be sure to treat it as a business and not get lost in fame or drugs. 
  • MJ’s Grandma is one of her best friends, and takes being supportive to the next level by hand designing the outfits she wears to the strip club. 
  • Yes, MJ does bleach her butthole, and it’s not as hard as you think! 
  • MJ is open like Bunnie about having work done, and has gotten a tummy tuck, nipple reduction, vaginoplasty, and there is no arguing that the results are anything but super hot. 
  • MJ is very single and ready to mingle, and is a proud mom, so all you hot stepdads — step up! 



Quotes: 

  • “I respect my body so much that I get paid for it.”  - MJ 
  • “Your grandma can probably make money...there is grandma fetish porn.” - B
  • “When you are crying in your Camry and your husband is cheating on you with a girl like me, now what bitch?” - B 
  • “I hate dark brown bootie hole meat, it’s so gross.” - B 
  • “Celina Powell just blocked me on Instagram, she’s mad at me!” - B
